### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE loyalty_programs (
    loyalty_program_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    program_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE members (
    member_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    last_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE,
    loyalty_program_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (loyalty_program_id) REFERENCES loyalty_programs(loyalty_program_id)
);

CREATE TABLE rewards (
    reward_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    reward_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    value DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
    expiry_date DATE,
    member_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (member_id) REFERENCES members(member_id)
);

### STATEMENT

UPDATE loyalty_programs SET start_date = '2023-01-01' WHERE loyalty_program_id = 1;

### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE loyalty_program (
    program_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    program_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    start_date DATE NOT NULL,
    end_date DATE,
    description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE members (
    member_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    last_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE,
    join_date DATE NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE rewards (
    reward_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    reward_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    points_required INT NOT NULL,
    description TEXT,
    expiration_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE transactions (
    transaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    member_id UUID NOT NULL,
    transaction_date DATE NOT NULL,
    points_earned INT NOT NULL,
    points_redeemed INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (member_id) REFERENCES members(member_id)
);

### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE loyalty_program (
    program_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    program_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE member (
    member_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    last_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE,
    phone_number VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE member_rewards (
    reward_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    member_id INT,
    reward_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    points_required INT,
    expiration_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (member_id) REFERENCES member(member_id)
);

CREATE TABLE transaction (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    member_id INT,
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP,
    amount DECIMAL(10,2),
    FOREIGN KEY (member_id) REFERENCES member(member_id)
);

CREATE TABLE transaction_history (
    history_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    transaction_id INT,
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP,
    description TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (transaction_id) REFERENCES transaction(transaction_id)
);
